post:
KnownHost, LLC is a privately held firm that has been providing premium managed services since 2006, and more recently we’ve been expanding our unmanaged offerings significantly. We own 100% of our equipment and have our own staff in the datacenter.

We have recently completed a massive datacenter overhaul/upgrade/migration of our flagship facility from Dallas, TX to Atlanta, GA for our dedicated server offerings so we can offer unmatched quality, speed, and reliability. We also became an EPA-certified green power provider.

We have a full line of the latest Xeon E, Xeon Scalable, and AMD EPYC offerings and we have also recently prepared some unmanaged budget offerings as well which is what I want to focus on here.

DirectAdmin is available for FREE on all dedicated server packages.

DDoS protection is included with all servers at no extra charge!

Private networking is available with all servers on a private port with your own VLAN.

All servers include full access to a self-management panel for remote reboots, IPMI/console, OS reloads, bandwidth tracking, and more. The panel supports sub-account access with permission control.

In most cases setup is instant if you order the hardware as listed. If you customize your server then setup is generally completed within a couple of hours. We have onsite staff standing by to configure your server(s)!

Without further ado, here are the packages:

https://www.knownhost.com/budget-dedicated.html

Unmanaged Budget Package 1 (extremely limited inventory):

  • Dual Xeon E5620 @ 2.4GHz (8 Cores + HT)
  • 32GB DDR3 ECC RAM
  • 240GB Enterprise SSD or 1TB HDD
  • 10TB BW @ 1Gbps (public)
  • 1Gbps Private Networking
  • /29 IPv4 (5 usable)
  • /64 IPv6

$49/mo $24.5/mo paid monthly (recurring) with coupon KHBB50

Almost all aspects of the servers can be customized/upgraded on the order forms including RAM, disks, bandwidth, and additional IPs. If there is an OS you want but don’t see available on the order form shoot me a PM or reply here and we can probably get it added.

Looking glass: https://lg.atl.knownhost.com/

Current-gen Intel Xeon and AMD EPYC dedicated servers are available here starting at $74.12/mo with coupon KHSM1U15.

If you have any questions let us know
